Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Maxima watched & listened the exchange between Hydras & Rodimus. Rather 
amused in the slightest. 

But hearing Rodimus' words of getting Blackstorm back shot a little pain 
through her. She had indeed changed over time, ever since the Great War. This new 
beginning was far different than her warrior lifestyle many, many years ago. 

She stepped forward to the console screen, her crimson optics glaring at 
Rodimus. "I will not let you have her back, Rodimus. Nor will I let you harm 
Hydras in ANY way!" she growled. So protective had she become. Those she considered 
here, function, were all she had now. It was beyond programming now, it was 
instinct. Those here & those in the Ark, she will fight desperately for. 

However, she did tell Kup that she wanted to arrange a meeting of parlay 
between her & Rodimus, as much as she despised him. She still intended to meet 
with him concerning the Ark. However, now Nightlight, aka Blackstorm, will be 
brought into the issue.

They were once again treading on very thin ice, if not very hot lava!  

--part1_bc.39ca7b9d.2c224d24_boundary
